n0:createOracleTrigger.n0:source: CREATE OR REPLACE EDITIONABLE TRIGGER "%USER_NAME%"."STA_SYSTEM_PARAMETER_IOIUD" INSTEAD OF INSERT OR UPDATE OR DELETE ON "STA_SYSTEM_PARAMETER_DML_V" FOR EACH ROW /* This is the instead of trigger for the DML view of the table "STA_SYSTEM_PARAMETER". - Generator: OM_TAPIGEN - Generator version: 0.6.3 - Generator action: COMPILE_API - Generated at: 2024-05-01 03:06:25 - Generated by: PNL14U85 */ BEGIN IF INSERTING THEN "STA_SYSTEM_PARAMETER_API".create_row ( p_id => :new."ID" /*PK*/ /*GENERATED BY DEFAULT ON NULL AS IDENTITY*/, p_parameter => :new."PARAMETER", p_value => :new."VALUE" ); ELSIF UPDATING THEN "STA_SYSTEM_PARAMETER_API".update_row ( p_id => :new."ID" /*PK*/, p_parameter => :new."PARAMETER", p_value => :new."VALUE" ); ELSIF DELETING THEN raise_application_error (-20000, 'Deletion of a row is not allowed.'); END IF; END "STA_SYSTEM_PARAMETER_IOIUD"; /
